channel.title: ASF Jira
channel.description: This file is an XML representation of an issue

item.title: [HIVE-13449] LLAP: HS2 should get the token directly, rather than from LLAP
item.description: HS2 doesn't need a roundtrip to LLAP; it can instantiate the SecretManager directly.
item.summary: LLAP: HS2 should get the token directly, rather than from LLAP

status.description: The issue is considered finished, the resolution is correct. Issues which are not closed can be reopened.

comments.comment: The patch. This will conflict massively with the other token patch, I will resolve the conflicts after one of them goes in.
vikram.dixit hagleitn perhaps you can review this

ATTACHMENT ID: 12800357 - PreCommit-HIVE-MASTER-Build

Actually, since the LLAP tokens were scoped to the cluster, there is a problem - HS2 doesn't know the full LLAP cluster name including the appId; also the local and remote paths diverge enough to probably require separate APIs. For now, attaching the rebased WIP patch.

hagleitn jdere vikram.dixit uploaded a new patch; this refactors some code around the tokens for Tez session, so I'd like to commit it before some other security patches that would otherwise conflict a lot.
SecretManager was moved, and LlapSecurityHelper was also mostly moved to LlapTokenClientFactory; the rest are new changes. The RB link is attached.
I left an editorial comment on RB for the description of hive.llap.create.token.locally.

Minor change - some reuse and stopping the threads.
Committed to master. Thanks for the reviews!

Doc note: This adds hive.llap.create.token.locally to HiveConf.java, so it will need to be documented in the wiki for release 2.1.0.

  • Configuration Properties – LLAP

Added a TODOC2.1 label.
